subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Over the years, the Rangers have seldom had two old pros as proven and as productive in the playoffs as 35-year-old Jaromir Jagr and 38-year-old Brendan Shanahan.
snippet: Over the years, the Rangers have seldom had two old pros as proven and as productive in the playoffs as 35-year-old Jaromir Jagr and 38-year-old Brendan Shanahan.
